name: Baby Bike - Driving Role Play
description:
Baby Bike is a fun pretend play motorbike driving app with lots of cool animations for the little one. Have you ever watched your kid getting curious with bikes on road or driving in general? Well now, you can let your toddler have fun in driving a bike with your Baby Bike App!

In addition, we have chosen a number of children songs including popular nursery rhymes to sing along. Nice smooth animations and motor bike sound effects make this app unique!

Some of the features include:

- Play children songs in the music player
- Tap on various bike objects and get real sounds
- Choose Baby Photo in the settings and surprise them when their photo appears in the mirror
- Let your kid explore tapping on the sun, cloud and find interesting animations with fun sounds.
- And much more!

This universal app is perfect for those with iPad whilst the iPhone version comes in handy whenever you need it.

Give it a try! You won't regret it!
